translation.en: [bubbling]
[Emily] Have you ever wondered what makes things glow?
translation.de: Hast du dich je gefragt, wieso Dinge leuchten?

translation.en: Today, we're gonna focus on one of my favorites.
translation.de: Es geht um eins meiner Lieblingsthemen.

translation.en: Things that are...
fluorescent.
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
Hey, little scientists, come on in.
-Hi, Miss Emily! -[Emily] Hello. Welcome!
-[cheerful music playing] -Now, art is pretty cool, right?
[kids] Yeah!
But we're not doing art today.
translation.de: Heute geht es nicht ums Kunst.

translation.en: -We're doing science. -Yes!
Yes!
I wish there were a way that we could combine the two.
translation.de: Ich wünschte, wir könnten beides kombinieren.

translation.en: Ooh. Maybe there is.
Today, we are gonna make our own fluorescent paint.
translation.de: Heute machen wir unsere eigene Leuchtfarbe.

translation.en: -Whoa. -That's gonna be fun.
Emily wants us to make fluorescent paint! Could she be any cooler?
translation.de: Emily will Leuchtfarbe machen. Könnte sie noch cooler sein?

translation.en: [Emily] But before we start making fluorescent paint,
translation.de: Aber bevor wir die Leuchtfarbe herstellen,

translation.en: we just have to turn off the visible light...
translation.de: schalten wir das sichtbare Licht aus und...

translation.en: -...and turn on... -[kids] Wow! the invisible lights.
-Cool! -Whoa!
I love everything that glows, so today is my new favorite day.
translation.de: Ich liebe alles, was leuchtet. Der Tag wird toll.

translation.en: Like, it's a dream, but in real life!
translation.de: Es ist ein Traum, aber im echten Leben!

translation.en: This isn't just the ground. This is the floor-escent!
translation.de: Das ist nicht nur der Boden. Das ist der Leuchtboden!

translation.en: Follow the path on the ground to your stations
translation.de: Folgt dem Pfad zu euren Stationen,

translation.en: and get all of your materials,
translation.de: holt euer Material und kommt zurück.

translation.en: -then come back to the table. -[Arya] Let's do this!
translation.de: holt euer Material und kommt zurück. Los geht's!

translation.en: I love stuff that glows!
Toys that glow, glow sticks.
Neon T-shirts, signs, lights.
It's like a glow party!
Emily, I wonder, what kind of lights are these?
translation.de: Emily, was sind das für Lampen?

translation.en: Ooh, good question, Zaela.
These lights that we are seeing right now are known as black lights,
and they're emitting a lot of ultraviolet light.
-[boy] Cool! -Wow.
Emily, why do sunglasses say "UV protection?"
So, "UV" stands for ultraviolet.
It's protecting you from the ultraviolet light that comes from the sun.
translation.de: Es schützt euch vor dem Ultraviolettlicht der Sonne.

translation.en: It's really, really energetic, but that means that it can hurt our eyes,
translation.de: Es ist sehr energetisch, aber es kann der Haut und den Augen schaden.

translation.en: and it can even hurt our skin.
translation.de: aber es kann der Haut und den Augen schaden.

translation.en: -Sunscreen... -Oh, yeah. ...also has UV protection.
-That's cool. -I never knew that.
I thought I know everything about science.
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich weiß alles über Wissenschaft.

translation.en: No, Emily knows more!
Hey, Emily, if UV light comes from the sun, then why don't we see it like this light?
translation.de: Wenn UV-Licht von der Sonne kommt, wieso sehen wir es dann nicht?

translation.en: [Emily] That's a very good question, Zaela.
You know the colors of the rainbow?
Red, orange, yellow, green, blue... [Zaela] Yeah.
[Emily] At the end, you have indigo and violet.
translation.de: Am Ende sind Indigo und Violett.

translation.en: [Emily] After violet comes ultraviolet.
Light that we can't really see with our eyes.
translation.de: Licht, das wir nicht sehen können.

translation.en: So black light has ultraviolet light, but it also has a little bit of violet light.
translation.de: Schwarzlicht hat Ultraviolettlicht, aber auch violettes Licht.

translation.en: That's why we see it as kind of this purply glow.
translation.de: Darum sehen wir es als eine Art Lila.

translation.en: -[boy] What? -That's so cool.
-Ultraviolet? -Yeah.
It sounds like the name of an alien planet.
It does sound like the name of an alien planet.
So, fluorescents work with ultraviolet light.
The invisible light.
It's really, really highly energetic light.
translation.de: Es ist ein sehr energetisches Licht.

translation.en: And when it hits the fluorescent paint,
the fluorescent paint absorbs some of that energy
translation.de: absorbiert die Farbe etwas von der Energie

translation.en: and releases the rest of it with light that we can actually see with our eyes.
translation.de: und gibt den Rest mit sichtbarem Licht frei.

translation.en: -That's cool. So cool. -Cool.
So to see that further, -I have a ping-pong ball. -Yeah.
translation.de: Um euch das zu zeigen, nehme ich einen Tischtennisball.

translation.en: Okay, this ping-pong ball is like our ultraviolet light.
translation.de: Ok, dieser Ball ist unser UV-Licht.

translation.en: And pretend that the table is like our fluorescent paint.
translation.de: Wir tun so, als wäre der Tisch die Leuchtfarbe.

translation.en: So, the ultraviolet light comes in really fast,
at the speed of light, with highly energetic particles,
and some of the energy is absorbed into the table,
translation.de: Einen Teil der Energie absorbiert der Tisch,

translation.en: and some of that energy is released back to us with light we can see.
translation.de: den Rest der Energie setzt er als sichtbares Licht frei.

translation.en: So when the ball bounces back up,
that's the light we see with our eyes.
[Arya] Cool!
Yeah. And one ping-pong ball is cool,
but it doesn't really illustrate the entire process,
translation.de: zeigt aber nicht den ganzen Prozess,

translation.en: because that's happening with every single atom inside our fluorescent paint.
translation.de: Denn das passiert mit jedem Atom in unserer Leuchtfarbe.

translation.en: Whoa.
And there are trillions and trillions of atoms
translation.de: Und es gibt Billionen von Atomen...

translation.en: -inside the fluorescent paint. -Trillions?
-Trillions? -Whoa!
So instead of one ball, we need tons of them.
translation.de: Wir brauchen also viel mehr als nur einen Ball.

translation.en: Science is so fun! Wow!
Don't tell Emily, but I'm keeping this one. Pink is my favorite color.
translation.de: Sagt es Emily nicht, aber den behalte ich. Ich liebe Pink.

translation.en: [kids] Yeah!
When all those ping-pong balls were coming down,
that was like the highly energetic rays of ultraviolet light,
translation.de: waren das die Strahlen des UV-Lichts.

translation.en: and when they bounced back up, that's like the spectacular parade of photons
translation.de: Als sie wieder aufsprangen, waren das die vielen Photonen,

translation.en: that we see as different colors of light.
translation.de: die wir als Farben des Lichts sehen.

translation.en: [kids] Whoa!
That is so cool.
Emily makes science fun.
Ping-pong balls and glow-y stuff?
Wait a minute, is this a surprise birthday party for me?
translation.de: Ist das eine Überraschungsparty für mich?

translation.en: So, you guys ready to make some fluorescent paint yourself?
-[kids] Yeah! -Okay.
translation.de: Ja! Ok, schnappt euch die Schüsseln.

translation.en: Get your mixing bowls ready,
we're gonna create three different colors of fluorescent paint.
These are the insides of highlighters...
translation.de: Das ist das Innere eines Textmarkers.

translation.en: [kids] Wow! ...which contain chemicals that are fluorescent.
And so you want to take the color of your choice
translation.de: Ihr sucht euch eine Farbe aus

translation.en: and start pouring a little bit of water over the top
while you squeeze it.
Look how that glows in the light.
translation.de: Seht, wie das im Licht leuchtet.

translation.en: Can I combine colors? -You can combine colors. -Whoa! This is about experimenting.
translation.de: -Kann ich Farben mischen? -Klar, das ist ein Experiment.

translation.en: -Do whatever you want. -Yeah!
[Emily] The other thing you want to do
is we're gonna do a little scoop of cornstarch,
just to thicken up our paint.
-All right? -Oh, my fingers are glowing!
-Your fingers are fluorescent. -Cool!
[Emily] Oh, my gosh. -Look at Nathan's face! -Whoa!
Your face is fluorescent.
-Really? -Yeah!
[Mason] We're glowing! We're glowing!
[Arya] I'm glowing! I'm glowing!
Ooh, this experiment makes me so happy.
The messier, the better!
I feel like a scientist.
Oh, no!
No!
I put too much in.
Oh, don't worry about it. -Science is all about trial and error. -Oh, you're right.
translation.de: Nicht schlimm, denn beim Forschen geht es um Versuch und Irrtum.

translation.en: We're gonna add more cornstarch to thicken it up.
translation.de: Wir geben Maisstärke dazu, um es zu verdicken.

translation.en: Look how much this is glowing.
[Mason] This is amazing.
-Scientists, are you ready to go paint? -[kids] Yeah!
Okay, take your materials and let's go over to our canvas.
translation.de: Geht mit euren Materialien zur Leinwand.

translation.en: [boy] Okay, guys. Wow.
[Emily] Look at that. [Zaela] It is gonna be a masterpiece.
translation.de: -Seht euch das an. -Das wird ein Meisterwerk.

translation.en: I love painting. It's all over my hands and my hair.
translation.de: Ich liebe malen. Die Farbe ist überall.

translation.en: -I'm going to paint my nails green! -[laughing]
It's awesome!
Remember, art is all about exploring new boundaries.
translation.de: Bei Kunst geht es darum, an Grenzen zu gehen.

translation.en: And art and science is about expressing yourself.
translation.de: Bei Kunst und Wissenschaft kann man sich selbst verwirklichen.

translation.en: So, put down those paintbrushes,
and put your body into it.
♪ These kids are glowing in the dark ♪
♪ They're glowing in the dark, yeah Glowing in the dark ♪
translation.de: Leuchten im Dunkeln, ja Leuchten im Dunkeln

translation.en: ♪ They're glowing in the dark ♪
♪ These kids are glowing in the dark They're glowing in the dark, yeah ♪
translation.de: Die Kinder leuchten im Dunkeln Leuchten im Dunkeln, ja

translation.en: Science is messy, and I'm all about messes. [laughs]
translation.de: Wissenschaft ist Chaos, ich mag Chaos.

translation.en: ♪ How do they do it? ♪
♪ How do they glow? ♪
-♪ Did they eat some magic nachos? ♪ -One more.
Yeah!
♪ Glowing on their skin And on their clothes ♪
I look a mess!
♪ I bet Emily knows ♪
♪ Why those kids are glowing in the dark Glowing in the dark, yeah ♪
translation.de: Warum die Kinder im Dunkeln leuchten Im Dunkeln leuchten

translation.en: ♪ Glowing in the dark They're glowing in the dark ♪
translation.de: Sie leuchten im Dunkeln Leuchten im Dunkeln

translation.en: -[kids cheer] -[Emily] Okay, little scientists,
translation.de: Sie leuchten im Dunkeln Leuchten im Dunkeln Ok, kleine Forscher,

translation.en: today we learned all about ultraviolet light, fluorescent paint,
translation.de: heute haben wir alles über UV-Licht und Leuchtfarbe gelernt

translation.en: and all about how to combine art with science.
translation.de: und wie man Kunst mit Wissenschaft kombiniert.

translation.en: And remember, stay curious...
[all] And keep exploring!
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
For today's at-home experiment, we are going to make our very own lava lamp
translation.de: Als Experiment für zu Hause bauen wir eine Lavalampe

translation.en: using the power of density.
Now, remember, all kid scientists need a grown-up's approval.
translation.de: Alle Forscher brauchen die Zustimmung eines Erwachsenen.

translation.en: So, for this one, you need a little bit of water, a glass, like this,
translation.de: Für das Experiment braucht ihr Wasser, so ein Glas,

translation.en: some vegetable oil,
salt,
and to go with the theme of the day, we have some phosphorescent powder and a UV light,
translation.de: und passend zum Tagesthema Leuchtstoffpulver und ein UV-Licht,

translation.en: because we wanna make our lava lamp glow.
So, the first thing you wanna do is fill your glass most of the way
translation.de: Als Erstes befüllt ihr euer Glas fast bis zum Rand

translation.en: with water.
And then, you wanna add your vegetable oil.
translation.de: Und dann kommt das Pflanzenöl dazu.

translation.en: So, if we watch what happens here, watch closely,
translation.de: Seht genau zu, was hier passiert.

translation.en: because the vegetable oil is rising to the top.
That's because vegetable oil is less dense than water.
translation.de: Pflanzenöl hat eine geringere Dichte als Wasser.

translation.en: It's lighter than water, so it rises to the top.
translation.de: Es ist leichter und steigt nach oben.

translation.en: Now, to start our lava lamp effect, we have some salt here.
translation.de: Um den Lavalampen-Effekt auszulösen, nehmen wir Salz.

translation.en: Salt is heavier than water, so it's gonna wanna fall to the bottom.
translation.de: Salz ist schwerer als Wasser und sinkt zum Boden.

translation.en: So when I add it here,
you can see what happens.
It's grabbing onto the molecules in the oil, and taking down some of that oil with it.
translation.de: Es klammert sich an die Moleküle im Öl und nimmt das Öl mit.

translation.en: But once it gets down to the bottom, the salt dissolves in water,
translation.de: Sobald es unten ist, löst sich das Salz im Wasser auf,

translation.en: and you can see the oil starts rising to the top again.
translation.de: und man sieht, wie das Öl wieder nach oben steigt.

translation.en: And we're seeing that same effect that we had before.
translation.de: Das ist derselbe Effekt wie davor.

translation.en: But we want to make it glow, right?
So let's add some phosphorescent powder.
And we're gonna make this glow really bright orange.
translation.de: Wir werden es orange leuchten lassen.

translation.en: Mix, mix, mix, mix.
Okay, so, now, all we need is our UV light
translation.de: Ok, jetzt brauchen wir nur noch unser UV- Licht,

translation.en: so we can see this glow in action.
translation.de: um zu sehen, wie es leuchtet.

translation.en: Look at that, that worked so well!
translation.de: Seht nur! Das hat so gut funktioniert!

translation.en: And the fun part about this
is that you can do this again and again.
translation.de: dass man es immer wieder tun kann.

translation.en: And look at that, look how cool that is.
translation.de: Und seht mal, wie cool das ist.

translation.en: That is how you make your very own glowing lava lamp.
translation.de: So baut man sich eine eigene leuchtende Lavalampe.

♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
♪ Yeah! ♪
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
